post.body: Em-Quit the hotel?Great.Ur no longer a slave of Kemah Boardwalk.Im going to go tanning today.Watching cold case files!
Gina-Have u tried a hot toddy?Hot tea,brandy,lemon,&honey.It seemed to put some pep in my step after feeling under the weather.
em-ready 2 get back in the game w/ the internship?Hoping 2 just get it out of the way.This next semester is goin b busy.thats how i like it
jk-no pain no gain.U and ash look adorable.glad yall finally decided to capitalize on that.woke up 4 1st time in days feelin good.progress
Been sippin on that robitussin trying to beat whatever has been dragging me down the last couple of days.
Watching David attempt to make a sauce out of orange peels.Been working my butt off at the gym! Hoping to see/feel some results soon.
Seems like im starting to have wicked cough.No good.Waitin 4 the new years festivities to begin.Happy 2009 everyone!
K8&mark-Got my package.I lu lu luv it.I love both of those scents.I can hardly wait to jump in the shower and lather up.
mall was good!I went in on a mission.& mission accomplished...a few new shirts.Crossin my fingers that i dont work on new years eve.
http://twitpic.com/xds5 - David up on roof.Not that great yet but perhaps my pictures will get better after i finish my photography 101 ...
http://twitpic.com/xdqv - Got a new sweet camera from David 4 xmas.So we had a bit of a photo shoot.Heres one of the boys.
im also looking forward to getting ur package in the mail!Its cold again. The weather doesnt know what it wants to be.
oh im glad to hear u recieved it. Hope it brought some delight.Just wanted to send something to show you that ya'll were in our thoughts.
meeeeerrrry christmas!
Gina-saw the xmas pics on the boys' fridge. SOoO adorable!
http://twitpic.com/uygx - K8&MARK-proof laurent is still alive and kicking.I was starting to think he vanished but we got him to come to ...
em-u were greatly missed last night.ha went to that party w/o my wingman.but hope the new job is swell.Need2Cu soon.Its been like a week!
jke-black&white party was good times!I liked star bux crowd.Lookin 4ward to xmas.But the reality of D leaving shortly after is sinking in
watching show on evolution on the history channel.its quite interesting. working dbl after dbl 4 the next few days.
http://twitpic.com/tmeh - a personal fav. of me and emily. haha
